targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
                                      			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(d.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))	
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(d.fecha_registro)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and  b.principal is true and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback >= 3.5

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
                                      			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback >= 2.5

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
                                      			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))	
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT

                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
                                      			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a 
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
                                      			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))

			FROM gestion.caso a 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null

SELECT 
       ROUND(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT 
                                             count(a.id)
                                      			FROM gestion.caso a
                                      			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                      			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
                                      			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
                                      			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
                                      			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
                                      			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
                                      			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
                                      			and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))
                                             )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and ((a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null) or (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'))

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback >= 3.5

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback	>= 2.5

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5) and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.feedback < 1.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and a.verificado = 'SI' and a.feedback is null

SELECT 
       count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio) and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and ((a.verificado = 'SI'	and a.feedback is null) or (a.feedback < 2.5 and a.verificado = 'SI'))

SELECT 
      e.nombre as "ESTADO", 
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback >= 3.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback >= 2.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "INSATISFECHO",
			sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY POCO SATISFACHO",
		  CONCAT(case when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 1 then 'MUY POCO SATISFACHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 2 then 'INSATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 3 then 'SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) > 3 then 'MUY SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) is null then 'SIN VALORACIÓN'
                  end) as "PROMEDIO",
      sum(CASE WHEN (a.feedback is null and a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SIN VALORACIÓN Y CONFIRMADO",
      count(*) AS "TOTAL ATENDIDO"
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados)
			and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))	
			group by e.nombre ORDER BY "MUY SATISFECHO" desc

SELECT 
      m.nombre || ' (' ||  e.nombre || ')'  as "MUNICIPIO", 
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback >= 3.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 3.5 and a.feedback >= 2.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SATISFECHO",
      sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 2.5 and a.feedback >= 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "INSATISFECHO",
			sum(CASE WHEN a.feedback < 1.5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "MUY POCO SATISFACHO",
		  CONCAT(case when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 1 then 'MUY POCO SATISFACHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 2 then 'INSATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) = 3 then 'SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) > 3 then 'MUY SATISFECHO'
                  when round(avg(a.feedback)) is null then 'SIN VALORACIÓN'
                  end) as "PROMEDIO",
      sum(CASE WHEN (a.feedback is null and a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "SIN VALORACIÓN Y CONFIRMADO",
      count(*) AS "TOTAL ATENDIDO"
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.resolutorio r on r.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro)
			and r.nombre in ($ministerio) and e.nombre in ($estados) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
			and r.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
			and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) and ((a.feedback >= 2.5) or (a.verificado = 'SI'))	
			group by m.nombre, e.nombre ORDER BY "MUY SATISFECHO" desc

list.definition: SELECT  nombre FROM gestion.estado WHERE id < 25 order by id
list.label: ESTADOS
list.name: estados
list.query: SELECT  nombre FROM gestion.estado WHERE id < 25 order by id

list.definition: SELECT a.nombre  FROM gestion.municipio a inner join gestion.estado b on a.id_estado = b.id where  b.nombre in ($estados)
list.label: MUNICIPIO
list.name: municipio
list.query: SELECT a.nombre  FROM gestion.municipio a inner join gestion.estado b on a.id_estado = b.id where  b.nombre in ($estados)
